testcase.name: Money transfer should be available
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to login page...............................................passed Then User logs in as a customer.............................................passed When User clicks on my operations...........................................passed And User navigates to money transfer button.................................passed And User selects an account from account dropdown "checking account for t37customer".passed And User selects an account to account dropdown "investment account for t37customer".passed And User enters amount of balance "3000"....................................passed And User provides a description for transfer "3000$ transfered between checking and investment accounts".passed And User clicks on make transfer button.....................................passed Then System should display succes message as "".............................passed
